edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.views
Class RationaleUpdateEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.views.RationaleUpdateEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RationaleUpdateEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

when an event occurs in one view that other views need to know about, fire this is the event that gets fired off. We fire an event when a rationale element is modified and we fire an event when an association is invoked from the Java file (Package Explorer). We also fire an event when we remove a status override via the integrated search display.

Author:
jburge
See Also:

fireOpenDBEvent

public void fireOpenDBEvent(org.eclipse.jdt.core.IJavaElement jEle,
                            org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display disp,
                            UpdateType type)
Fire an event to open the associated database when Open Rationale is called from the Package Explorer. This one handles IJavaProject type elements, which means it appears only for opened Java projects.

Parameters:
jEle - - the java element
disp - - the display
type - - the update type

fireOpenDBEvent

public void fireOpenDBEvent(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject iProj,
                            org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display disp,
                            UpdateType type)
Fire an event to open the associated database when Open Rationale is called from the Package Explorer, this time for an IProject type element (which is any closed project or a non-Java open project).

Parameters:
iProj- - the IProject
disp - - the display
type - - the update type

disp - - the display
